item.title: The EU’s New Corporate Sustainability Directive Is a Tariff on U.S. Companies
item.description: The Trump administration must enter into negotiations with the EU to stop the harm that this law will do to our largest and most successful companies.

item.title: Democrats’ Erie Pains Show Their Nationwide Struggles
item.description: Republicans triumphed in this Pennsylvania swing county.

item.title: Republicans Should Think Much Bigger on Tax Cuts
item.description: The GOP can deliver real results and better lives for all if they have the courage to rethink how our country taxes people.

item.title: Forcing the Divestiture of Google Chrome
item.description: What the Department of Justice overlooks in the Google case.

item.title: The Biden Legacy: Nearly a Trillion in Improper Payments
item.description: Over four years, the Biden administration unintentionally misspent $926 billion — to say nothing of the trillions it misspent on purpose.
